    • Uses of Action in eapli.framework.actions

      Subinterfaces of Action in eapli.framework.actions 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  UndoableAction
      a generic Action interface (the Command pattern) for actions that can be undone.
      Classes in eapli.framework.actions that implement Action 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CompoundAction
      A compound action. it implements the Composite (GoF) pattern. subclasses must override execute() AND call next() in the end
      class  ExitAction 
      class  IfThenAction 
      class  NullAction 
      class  ReturnAction
